blog.description: kai //bi/ they/them //header by spidaerman.

summary: heathers (ghc) au hcs cuz why not at this point (not that this should be a thing)
title: heathers (ghc) au hcs cuz why not at this point (not that this should be a thing)
body:
cyrus is heather mcnamara. he gets a little  lotta nervous around people and constantly feels like his life is a storm that is only manageable as long as he has people around him that support him. so when his parents arrange for him to become friends with the heathers, he sees it as protection. and as long as he maintains his relationship with them, no one will give him crap for being gay. and no one does. 

andi is heather duke. an intellectual who loves to craft. she doesn’t mind being second fiddle because it means that she’s the one that Buffy goes to. her self esteem is a little too dependent on buffy and cyrus but she doesn’t like that the majority of the school believes she doesn’t have a personality. she does, she just doesn’t show it because she wants to fit in and buffy told her that in order to be seen as strong and popular, there are parts of her that don’t need to be talked about. 

buffy is heather chandler. she’s in sports and is a fashion icon. she is seen as a champion and overall outgoing and aggressive. everyone loves her. she can come off as a little overcompetitive and concerned about her image, that causes her to be a little too harsh on andi, her second in command. 

jonah beck is veronica sawyer. he’s never really had a solid group of friends before. there’s gus, and that’s it. and in his senior year, he is tired of being pushed around like he’s nothing. and he was always good at being charismatic… captain of the space otters and all. so he wins over the heathers and joins their group. and gets a little bit in over his head upon meeting school outcast amber who’s a little bit too dark. 

amber is jason dean. after a unstable childhood, she tries to have a relationship with her father who is a bad parent to say the least. she tries to get herself in therapy but her father is always between jobs and doesn’t have the money to get her the help she needs. she pulls enough money together for  a session but that’s all she can manage before her father finds out and calls her weak. fearing worse, amber pulls out of therapy and uses slurpies and other numbing measures as coping mechanisms. and then she meets jonah, a good kid joining the heathers that seems like an okay being. 

gus is martha dunnstock: believes in happy endings, jonah’s best friend. 

and then maybe a lighter version of the actual plot cuz it’s pretty dark,,??

summary: Let’s cross that bridge when we get to it!
body:
Can the fandom maybe not stress over an episode that’s like….3-4 months from now??


Like I said previously when people were stressing over episode 12 at episode 8,


Let’s cross that bridge when we get to it!


Yeah, seeing the things Josh likes is nerve racking, but I worry for some of y’all that stay on his case 24/7. LET THE BOY BREATHE.


We had just gotten through one of the best weekends ever. Cyrus said gay, TJ’s basically in love with him, and now Buffy and Andi are noticing the chemistry between the two. Can we just stick to that until the next episode??

I’m trying to bring positivity up in this bitch, I hoped it helped👍🏽

blog.name: tyrus-endgayme-confirmed
blog.title: Tyrus is winning
blog.description: Just a place where I can scream my love for Tyrus as loud as I can

tags: tj is the oblivious one here
summary:
Cyrus: I love Buffy to pieces but man, that girl is so oblivious.
Cyrus: She has no idea that Marty is still madly in love with...
body:
Cyrus: I love Buffy to pieces but man, that girl is so oblivious.

Cyrus: She has no idea that Marty is still madly in love with her, despite the goofy way he’s always looking at her and how eager he always is to spend time with her. And on top of that, she keeps denying that she likes him too, even though she so clearly does!

Cyrus: Like how can she not see it?? How can one not see something when it’s right there in from of them?? I mean, it’s so obvious! Marty is in no way subtle!

Cyrus: Doesn’t it just drive you insane at how clueless some people can be??

TJ, sitting in front of an elaborate arrangement a of baby taters he put together on the table to spell out the words GO OUT WITH ME ALREADY FOOL right where Cyrus can see it:

summary: Oml, I feel like I missed so much! Did josh say something that made People mad?? You made a post saying that we definitely...

blog.description:
mari, aka amber kippen reincarnate

she/her | bi | 15 | slytherin | sagittarius

tyrus, ambi, muffy, landi, rilaya, elmax

my fic masterlist!!

summary:
a scene i can picture happening in 3x12:
(after buffy and cyrus are quizzing andi about whatever the hell is going on with jonah...
body:
a scene i can picture happening in 3x12:

(after buffy and cyrus are quizzing andi about whatever the hell is going on with jonah and amber)

andi: i… gotta go talk to them *leaves*

buffy, turning to cyrus: so, question. is tj always like that around you?

cyrus: wh- what

buffy: like he was at the shiva

cyrus: i mean yeah, is that not how he acts all the time?

buffy: i think he likes you

cyrus: w h a t nooo way

and it continues like that n stuff

idk i just rlly want a tj mention ok

tags: like its cool that they interact with us already it would suck if we annoyed them or made them uncomfy with our Qs
summary: Sorry if this is controversial or whatever but can we leave josh (and the rest of the cast) alone about ships? I know they...
body: Sorry if this is controversial or whatever but can we leave josh (and the rest of the cast) alone about ships? I know they support our ships and stuff but I can only assume they get annoyed that the majority of the questions they get from fans are only about ships plus it’s not like they can spoil anything anyway
